name: AlexaGoogleCalendar
0:
”Alexa, what is on my schedule today?”
”Alexa, add an event”
”Alexa, move an event”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: change me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay on top of your Google Calendar schedule with Alexa. 

* Access and manage events on your Google Calendar by voice (“Alexa, what’s on my schedule?”, “Alexa, add an event”)
* Receive notifications for upcoming events or add calendar readouts to your morning Routines
* View your Google Calendar schedule on Amazon Echo Show devices and on-the-go with the Alexa Mobile apps on iOS and Android
 * Compatible with Amazon Echo speakers, Amazon Echo Show, and Fire TV devices with Alexa built-in

NOTE:

* To configure your Google calendar as the calendar that Alexa will help you add new events to, in your Alexa Mobile App (iOS & Android) visit Settings -- Calendar --Default Calendar
* To ask Alexa to announce your upcoming events, visit, in your Alexa Mobile App (iOS & Android), visit Settings -- Calendar -- Calendar notifications
